description: At Village Global, early-stage capital is just the beginning. We help you go faster with $500M AUM, a vibrant founder community, expert advice, and game-changing customer intros. Chaired by Reid Hoffman and backed by Jeff Bezos, Bill Gates, and more. Come build with the best network in tech.
industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals

updates.text:
📣 Applications are open again for Velocity, our bespoke program for pre-seed founders 👇

Founders get up to $1M, a peer cohort, and the flexibility of being fully remote. AI founders also get top-tier access to AI perks, thanks to Microsoft for Startups, OpenAI, and Anthropic. 

What do you get?
• Capital – Up to a $1M investment from us and our close network of angels and funds
• The Village Network – Find customers, experts, and your next investors
• AI Credits and Resources – Up to $350k in credits from Microsoft for Startups, $10k from OpenAI, and $1.5K from Anthropic.
• Peer Community – Join like minded founders in masterminds for accountability and peer support

Who is right for Velocity?
• Exceptional founders seeking greater Silicon Valley connectivity, whether in SF or  elsewhere
• Experienced operators starting a company for the first time and seek a strong community 
• AI founders who want to learn from brilliant AI luminaries
• Founders who want an edge when raising an epic seed round 

Ready to build the future? Apply now. 💡
https://lnkd.in/gzSzdwaZ

We’re thrilled to partner with Faizan Bhatty, an exceptional builder, perfectly suited to revitalize this often-overlooked category. The Wizard Perks team is dedicated to reimagining employee perks, ensuring that hardworking employees receive the corporate recognition they deserve.

The entire Village Global team is excited to join this journey alongside Watershed Ventures, Sequoia Capital (Scout), and Firsthand Alliance. ✨

🦾 Villager Tyler Hayes founded Atom Limbs to build AI prosthetics for the 100M individuals living with limb differences or loss. 

It's awe-inspiring that we're at the cusp of technology capable of restoring physical abilities at scale—from sight to full motor control and sensation.

I enjoyed chatting with my old friend Auren Hoffman 📚, who I've known for 22 years (we met when I was 15 yrs old). His entrepreneurial and investing track record is exemplary.

On his podcast we dove into the early stage VC landscape, the impact of AI on valuations, and how top firms evaluate (or fail to evaluate) founder quality. We also debated the relative value of networking and the 'Goldilocks Theory of Wealth.'

https://lnkd.in/dwsH8S-A
https://lnkd.in/dBEQxMDi

Congratulations to Jerry Ting, Jake Sussman, Amine A., and the entire Evisort team on being acquired by Workday! Since we invested in 2018 we have watched Evisort evolve from an ambitious idea to a trusted AI-driven solution used by major companies worldwide.

When we first met, Jerry, Jake, and Amine had a simple insight: contract review is tedious, and AI could solve it. What’s remarkable isn’t just their vision and resulting product, but how they’ve consistently listened to customers, stayed agile, and embraced new technologies like LLMs.

This acquisition is the right step for the team and their continued growth. Workday’s values align perfectly with Evisort’s, and we’re thrilled to see what they build together. We know the best is still ahead.

Check out the official announcement here: https://lnkd.in/gkvb8MFk

Last week we hosted Howie Liu, CEO of Airtable, and many of our Village Global founders in San Francisco. Was fantastic to learn more about Airtable's journey from zero to the incredible platform it is today.

Some highlights: Airtable's evolution from PLG GTM to enterprise sales, how they do customer development conversations, the pros/cons of starting horizontal versus focusing on a niche, and the right amount of discomfort in order to push yourself.
